title: Phenomenological Inquiry to Enhance Employee Cohesion and Learning Relationships in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational dynamics and team collaboration concepts
context.additional_context: A process for current practitioners to explore workplace cohesion strategies and develop practical approaches linking them to improved learning relationships

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more factors contributing to workplace cohesion (shared vision, mutual support, job characteristics, etc.)
Learners can design a process for analyzing organizational cases using phenomenological research methods (interviews, focus groups)
Learners can project-based evaluate the impact of cohesion enhancement on employee learning culture and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
